actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks and one Chatkcha attack.

actions.name: Gythka
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Chatkcha
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
